document_data.name: ''First Blood''
document_data.mainbody: e blade was heavily chipped, while the hilt was well ornamented.
document_data.Description: The blade was heavily chipped, while the hilt was well ornamented.
document_data.Powers: ''First Blood'' was enhanced to quickly inflict terrible and lethal blows.
document_data.History: The sword was found by [[Cormyr]]ean forces after defeating the [[Shadar-kai (Netherese)|shadar-kai]] [[Karleth]] in the [[merchant's townhouse (Wheloon)|merchant's townhouse]] during the [[Shadovar invasion of Wheloon]].
